author: jvanzyl
msg: Adding BCEL to the JARs required to build maven.

author: jvanzyl
msg: The maven-classpath that is used internally by Maven is now generated
from by using the contents of the jars.list file.

author: jvanzyl
msg: Overhauled the bootstrap and fully documented each of the stages.
Closer to having everything shunted into a single directory.
We can now add/remove JARs required for the bootstrap/build/install

author: jvanzyl
msg: Broke some of the functionality in ProjectProperties into AntUtils. I
needed to be able to make a classpath and patternset from a list of
JARs in a file so make the bootstrap maintainable.
Added a few simple ant tasks that are now required by the bootstrap
The upshot is almost all of the hardcoding has been removed from the
